description:
template: move the empty check into parse, which needs it when constructing
tree sets.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5449062/diff/1/src/pkg/text/template/exec.go

http://codereview.appspot.com/5449062/diff/1/src/pkg/text/template/exec.go#newcode110
src/pkg/text/template/exec.go:110: println(t.Tree)
spurious println?

http://codereview.appspot.com/5449062/diff/1/src/pkg/text/template/helper.go
File src/pkg/text/template/helper.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5449062/diff/1/src/pkg/text/template/helper.go#newcode51

looks like a spurious println to me

http://codereview.appspot.com/5449062/diff/1/src/pkg/text/template/helper.go#newcode69
src/pkg/text/template/helper.go:69: println("same")
ditto

http://codereview.appspot.com/5449062/diff/1/src/pkg/text/template/helper.go#newcode72
src/pkg/text/template/helper.go:72: println("different")
ditto
